_package_info.description: Classic fantasy character classes including warriors, spellcasters, rogues, and hybrid classes with their abilities and roles
_package_info.author: Storymaster

class.name: Fighter
class.description: Master of weapons and armor, excelling in physical combat through training and discipline. Versatile warriors capable of adapting to any battlefield situation.
class.class_trait: Combat expertise, weapon mastery, tactical leadership

class.name: Wizard
class.description: Scholar of arcane magic who studies spells from ancient tomes. Masters reality manipulation through careful preparation and deep magical knowledge.
class.class_trait: Spellbook casting, ritual magic, arcane research

class.name: Cleric
class.description: Divine spellcaster drawing power from deities or spiritual forces. Healer and protector who channels faith into miraculous abilities.
class.class_trait: Divine magic, healing, undead turning

class.name: Rogue
class.description: Master of stealth, deception, and precision strikes. Expert at finding weaknesses and exploiting them through cunning rather than brute force.
class.class_trait: Sneak attack, stealth, skill expertise

class.name: Ranger
class.description: Wilderness warrior combining combat skills with nature magic. Guardian of the wild places, expert tracker and beast companion.
class.class_trait: Nature magic, animal companion, tracking

class.name: Paladin
class.description: Holy warrior bound by sacred oaths to fight evil and protect the innocent. Combines martial prowess with divine magic and unwavering conviction.
class.class_trait: Divine magic, lay on hands, smite evil

class.name: Barbarian
class.description: Primal warrior who channels raw fury and instinct in battle. Tough survivalist from wild lands who fights with savage intensity.
class.class_trait: Rage, damage resistance, primal instincts

class.name: Bard
class.description: Versatile performer who weaves magic through music, stories, and art. Jack-of-all-trades combining spellcasting with social manipulation.
class.class_trait: Bardic inspiration, versatile skills, charm magic

class.name: Sorcerer
class.description: Innate spellcaster born with natural magical abilities. Manipulates raw magical energy through will and emotion rather than study.
class.class_trait: Innate magic, metamagic, spontaneous casting

class.name: Warlock
class.description: Spellcaster who gains power through pacts with otherworldly entities. Wielder of eldritch magic with mysterious patrons and dark knowledge.
class.class_trait: Eldritch blast, patron powers, otherworldly magic

class.name: Druid
class.description: Nature priest who protects the natural world and its balance. Shapeshifter and elemental magic user with deep connection to primal forces.
class.class_trait: Wild shape, nature magic, elemental control

class.name: Monk
class.description: Martial artist who achieves supernatural abilities through discipline and meditation. Weaponless fighter drawing power from inner energy.
class.class_trait: Unarmed combat, ki powers, supernatural speed

class.name: Artificer
class.description: Magical inventor who creates wondrous items and mechanical devices. Combines arcane knowledge with crafting skills and technological innovation.
class.class_trait: Magical items, infusions, technological magic

class.name: Necromancer
class.description: Dark spellcaster specializing in death magic and undead minions. Master of life and death energies, feared for their forbidden knowledge.
class.class_trait: Undead minions, death magic, soul manipulation

class.name: Assassin
class.description: Professional killer specializing in stealth, poison, and precise elimination of targets. Shadow warrior trained in the arts of murder.
class.class_trait: Death attack, poison use, stealth mastery

class.name: Knight
class.description: Noble warrior bound by codes of honor and chivalry. Heavily armored cavalry fighter dedicated to protection of the innocent and service to lords.
class.class_trait: Heavy armor, mounted combat, noble bearing

class.name: Elementalist
class.description: Spellcaster specializing in elemental forces of fire, water, earth, and air. Master of destructive natural energies and elemental summoning.
class.class_trait: Elemental magic, elemental summoning, elemental immunity

class.name: Witch
class.description: Mystical practitioner of hedge magic and ancient traditions. Herbalist and curse-weaver dwelling on the edges of civilization.
class.class_trait: Curse magic, herbalism, familiar companion

class.name: Alchemist
class.description: Scholar-craftsman who creates magical potions, explosives, and transmutative substances. Scientist-wizard blending magic with experimental methods.
class.class_trait: Potion brewing, explosive devices, transmutation

class.name: Beast Master
class.description: Warrior with supernatural bond to animal companions. Hunter and trainer who fights alongside loyal creature allies in perfect coordination.
class.class_trait: Animal companions, beast communication, pack tactics

class.name: Spellsword
class.description: Warrior-mage combining martial combat with magical enhancement. Balanced fighter who augments weapons and armor with arcane power.
class.class_trait: Weapon enhancement, combat magic, magical defense

class.name: Shadow Dancer
class.description: Mystical warrior who manipulates darkness and shadow. Stealthy combatant who moves between planes and strikes from concealment.
class.class_trait: Shadow magic, plane shifting, darkness manipulation

class.name: Oracle
class.description: Divine prophet gifted with supernatural foresight and mystical knowledge. Seer who receives visions and guidance from higher powers.
class.class_trait: Prophecy, divine visions, fate manipulation

class.name: Demon Hunter
class.description: Specialized warrior trained to combat fiends and otherworldly threats. Holy warrior with knowledge of planar enemies and their weaknesses.
class.class_trait: Fiend hunting, planar knowledge, protective wards

class.name: Berserker
class.description: Frenzied warrior who enters battle trance states of unstoppable fury. Fierce combatant who becomes more dangerous when wounded.
class.class_trait: Battle frenzy, pain immunity, unstoppable rage
